name: Select Energy Services, Inc.
description: Select Energy Services, Inc. is a leading provider of water management solutions and services to the energy sector, primarily focusing on the oil and gas industry. Founded in 2016 and headquartered in Houston, Texas, the company operates with a commitment to delivering efficient and sustainable water management solutions that meet the growing demands of its clients. Select Energy Services offers a wide range of services including water sourcing, transportation, storage, and disposal, as well as specialized engineering services tailored to enhance operational efficiencies. The company’s innovative technologies and data-driven approaches help clients optimize their water usage while minimizing environmental impact. Through strategic partnerships and an extensive network of terminals and pipelines, Select Energy Services ensures that its customers have reliable access to the water resources they need. The firm is dedicated to safety, sustainability, and operational excellence, continually investing in technology and processes that support responsible water management practices. With a robust portfolio of services and a focus on long-term client relationships, Select Energy Services is positioned to play a pivotal role in the evolving energy landscape.

seo.meta_title: Select Energy Services, Inc. | Water Management Solutions for the Energy Sector
seo.meta_description: Select Energy Services, Inc. specializes in innovative water management solutions for the oil and gas industry. Explore our services and commitment to sustainability.

faq.answer: Select Energy Services provides water management solutions including sourcing, transportation, storage, and disposal services.

faq.answer: Select Energy Services is headquartered in Houston, Texas, USA.

faq.answer: John Schmitz is the CEO of Select Energy Services, Inc.

faq.answer: Select Energy Services was founded in 2016.

faq.answer: Select Energy Services primarily serves the oil and gas industry with water management solutions.
